text: Reginald Smyth (10 July 1917 â€“ 13 June 1998), known by his professional name Reg Smythe, was a British cartoonist. He created the popular, long-running Andy Capp comic strip. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:1998 deaths Category:British cartoonists Category:People from County Durham
